name: Peacemaker (itch) (sjasionowska)
description:
It's a beautiful, sunny day in a small town. Young Hippie just wants to go to a coffee shop and relax, but there are many pissed people in the city. (We live in stressful times.) 

But! Our man has an amazing power - shooting love, which can make angry people calm and relaxed. (And disappeared.) 

Help him fulfill his mission. Spread peace and love in the city.

Controls:

W - MOVE UP
A - MOVE LEFT
S - MOVE DOWN
D - MOVE RIGHT
E - USE
LEFT SHIFT - RUN
SPACE - SHOOT

This game was created during Ludum Dare 46 by:

Sandra Jasionowska 
Gameplay, Graphics
https://twitter.com/missphysics93

Krystian Kuryło 
User Interface, Music
https://twitter.com/notsuperhero2
